body_html:
Thanks. I think when I do conda install, it already upgrades the mkl for me. I also manually upgrade the mkl as you suggested. But it doesn't work. The way I'm doing this is :

  1. rollback to 0.2.0
  2. manually upgrade mkl
  3. upgrade pytorch

The same error stays still.

body:
Thanks. I think when I do conda install, it already upgrades the mkl for me. I also manually upgrade the mkl as you suggested. But it doesn't work. The way I'm doing this is :
1) rollback to 0.2.0
2) manually upgrade mkl
3) upgrade pytorch

The same error stays still.
